backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user registration, chat session management with messages, and artwork/music blob storage with sharing and retrieval functionality using Motoko's core libraries and blob-storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features related to the Scripter component: creation of chat interface for AI script generation, integration as a new tab in the main app, and implementation of AI script generation functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components (Header, ChatView, MathProblemSolver, MediaDisplay, TranslatorChat, MusicGenerator, ArtCanvas, Scripter), hooks (useChatSessions, useMediaGeneration, useTranslation, useAudioGeneration, useCanvasDrawing), and configuration files with dark theme and educational color palette.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, featuring deep blacks, dark grays, and vibrant teal/coral accents for the educational interface.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title 'Axora AI' and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with TanStack Router, Internet Identity authentication, and tabbed interface containing six features (Math Solver, Translator, Scripter, Media Gallery, Music Generator, Art) plus shared content viewer routes.
frontend/src/components/ArtCanvas.tsx: Art canvas component with HTML5 canvas drawing interface, color palette, brush/eraser tools, AI chat panel for art ideas, and Save/Share functionality with shareable URL generation and clipboard copy.
frontend/src/components/ChatSidebar.tsx: Collapsible sidebar component that displays a list of chat sessions with timestamps, allows creating new chats, and handles session selection.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Main chat interface component that displays messages in a conversation, handles user input with textarea, and simulates AI responses with alternating message bubbles.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, title, theme toggle (light/dark mode), and sign-out button for authenticated users using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/MathProblemSolve: Math problem solver component with difficulty level selection, teacher mode toggle, and client-side expression evaluation that generates step-by-step solutions and concept explanations.
frontend/src/components/MediaDisplay.tsx: Tabbed media gallery component for generating AI images and videos from text prompts, with upload functionality and progress tracking for both image and video files.
frontend/src/components/MusicGenerator.t: Music generation component with AI prompt-based audio creation and a beat pattern sequencer for kick/snare/hihat sounds, including playback controls, tempo adjustment, and music sharing functionality.
frontend/src/components/Scripter.tsx: React component that provides an AI-powered code generation interface with chat-style messages, code display with syntax highlighting, copy functionality, and history management.
frontend/src/components/SharedContentVie: Component for viewing shared artwork or music content via URL parameters, displaying loading states, error handling, and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/TranslatorChat.t: Translation interface component with language selection dropdowns, chat-style display of source and translated text, and translation history management.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages Internet Computer actor instances with authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtIdeaGenerator.t: Hook that generates art prompt ideas based on user input keywords (animals, landscapes, abstract, portraits, fantasy, space, flowers, food), returning randomized creative suggestions for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useArtworkShare.ts: Hook for sharing artwork by converting canvas to PNG blob, uploading to backend via actor, and providing URL copying functionality with mutation state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioGeneration.ts: Hook that generates synthetic audio using Web Audio API, creating simple melodies based on prompt characteristics and converting AudioBuffer to WAV blob format.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasDrawing.ts: Custom React hook that manages canvas drawing state and operations including brush color, size, erasing mode, and provides methods for drawing, clearing, and handling mouse/touch events on an HTML canvas element.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatSessions.ts: React Query-based hook for managing chat sessions with the backend actor, providing functionality to fetch sessions, add messages, create new sessions, and handle user registration with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaGeneration.ts: Hook for simulating AI image and video generation by creating placeholder media with canvas-based gradients and text overlays, managing generation state and storing generated media history.
frontend/src/hooks/useMusicShare.ts: React Query mutation hook for sharing music files to the backend by converting audio blobs to Uint8Array, uploading via ExternalBlob, and providing URL copying functionality for shared music.
frontend/src/hooks/useScriptGeneration.t: Hook that simulates AI-powered code generation by analyzing user requests and returning mock code snippets for various languages and frameworks (React, Python, JavaScript, API calls, etc.) with conversation history.
frontend/src/hooks/useSharedContent.ts: React Query hooks for fetching shared artwork and music content by ID from the backend actor, converting ExternalBlob responses to usable URLs and blob objects.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Hook that simulates text translation between languages with mock translations for common phrases (greetings, thanks) and maintains a history of translation pairs with timestamps.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a dark/black theme using OKLCH color space, including primary teal, coral accent colors, sidebar styling, and custom font families (Inter and Poppins).
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that combines clsx and tailwind-merge to merge Tailwind CSS class names efficiently.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH variables, custom border radius, box shadows, keyframe animations, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document describing 'Axora AI' (formerly 'Hollow AI'), a multi-modal AI application with math solving, media display, chat history sidebar, image/video generation, translation, music generation, art canvas, and script generation features, all with a dark theme.
